To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private StalledPattern _stalledpattern;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_stalledpattern = StalledPattern(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_stalledpattern.IsReady)
{
    var period = _stalledpattern.Period.Value;
    var current = _stalledpattern.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.stalledpattern = self.StalledPattern(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.stalledpattern.IsReady:
    period = self.stalledpattern.Period.Value
    current = self.stalledpattern.Current.Value
